Types

struct_tm {.importc: "struct tm", header: "<time.h>", completeStruct.} = object
Source   Edit   
Tm {.importc: "struct tm", header: "<time.h>".} = object
  tm_year*: int              ## years since 1900
  tm_mon*: range[0 .. 11]
  tm_mday*: range[1 .. 31]
  tm_hour*: range[0 .. 23]
  tm_min*: range[0 .. 59]
  tm_sec*: range[0 .. 61]    ## C89 is 0..61, C99 is 0..60
  tm_wday*: range[0 .. 6]
  tm_yday*: range[0 .. 365]
  tm_isdst*: int
